entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
